articles.title: Former Taiwanese superstar Liu Wen-cheng dies at 70 - The Star Online
articles.description: Liu was a star in the Mandarin pop scene during the 1970s and 1980s, and was known for his signature look of wearing a hat and scarf. His songs were also popular in Hong Kong, China and South-East Asia.
